content.raw:
Is this being in a code block intentional? The guided b1 tutorial gets sub bullets with a single space before the asterisk

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/d3137aa4930c450055dc37c56ff22a8910b069ee/guided_b/tutorial1.md

```
* A dedicated [GPU](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graphics_processing_unit),
 * Nvidia cards tend to work well in Ubuntu
```
content.html:
Is this being in a code block intentional? The guided b1 tutorial gets sub bullets with a single space before the asterisk

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/d3137aa4930c450055dc37c56ff22a8910b069ee/guided_b/tutorial1.md

* A dedicated [GPU](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graphics_processing_unit),
 * Nvidia cards tend to work well in Ubuntu

content.raw:
Yeah good point, added some instructions to the top, before the user creates their own branch: 9e18e76

Let me know what you think!
content.html:
Yeah good point, added some instructions to the top, before the user creates their own branch: 9e18e76

Let me know what you think!
